subject: Can't access source in sourceforge via anonymous access
msgSnippet: When I try to get the sources so I can backport JUnit 4.2 to Java 1.4 - I run into trouble with sourceforge (oh how I love cvs). I ve tried both the command
messageBody:
When I try to get the sources so I can backport JUnit 4.2 to Java 1.4
- I run into trouble with sourceforge (oh how I love cvs).

I've tried both the command line:

cvs -d:pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/junit login

and wincvs:

cvs -z9 -d :pserver;username=anonymous;hostname=junit.cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/junit
login

in both cases I get the following error:
cvs [login aborted]: connect to junit.cvs.sourceforge.net:2401 failed:
No connection could be made because the target machine actively
refused it.

Does any one know what's going on?
Would anyone be able to send me a zip of the current sources?
I expect that when I've completed the back port I will be to
contribute the changes back to the community.

Cheers
Mark Levison
